thread.title: Convenient location, clean, friendly and affordable
thread.title_full: Convenient location, clean, friendly and affordable - Review of Ibis Paris Gare de Lyon Ledru Rollin 12eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Hugo2011
title: Convenient location, clean, friendly and affordable
text: Walking distance from Gare the Lyon, this simple, clean and modern hotel is a great place for Paris. Employees were very friendly and helpful. The room is small but clean and comfortable. The location is also convenient for its proximity to a variety of restaurants and Bastille area.
